title: 10-Minute Meditation For Stress
description: A short, guided meditation session to help you release stress and find a moment of calm.

title: Coping With Anxiety: 11 Simple Ways
description: Practical, evidence-based tips and techniques to manage and reduce feelings of anxiety.

title: How to Get Your Brain to Focus | Chris Bailey | TEDxManchester
description: A practical TED talk explaining the science of attention and how to improve your focus intentionally.

title: How to Practice Mindfulness
description: A beginner's guide from Mindful.org that explains what mindfulness is and a simple exercise to start.

title: Sleep is Your Superpower | Matt Walker
description: An incredibly popular TED talk explaining the critical importance of sleep for learning, memory, and emotional well-being.
